messages.title: Supporting our town centre
messages.content: Ryan Henson, the local campaigner standing to be the next Member of Parliament for Bedford and Kempston, has vowed to reinvigorate the local town centre of Bedford.

messages.title: Getting Brexit done so that we can focus on our local priorities
messages.content: Ryan will be campaigning every day in the run up to the general election to ensure we get Brexit done.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Ryan Henson leads an NHS funding campaign for Bedford and Kempston, including an £850 million package to upgrade hospital services.
Ryan Henson wins up to £25 million investment for Town Centre.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: More Police with extra resources cut crime

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Plans for town centres to be included in future growth plans and to secure grants that boost the local economy.

issues.brexitEurope: Getting Brexit done so that we can focus on our local priorities.
issues.education: After leading a campaign this summer to fight for more Conservative funding for schools in Bedford and Kempston, the Conservative candidate Ryan Henson has welcomed the Prime Minister's latest move to invest more in education.
issues.environment: Ryan Henson has been practical with local Conservative MP Candidate's pledges - starting a community-led project that saw dozens of residents litter picking in Kempston.
issues.health: Ryan Henson leads NHS funding campaign for Bedford and Kempston.

housing.content: Ryan Henson, the local campaigner standing to be the next Member of Parliament for Bedford and Kempston, has vowed to reinvigorate the local town centre of Bedford.

endorsements.endorsement: We need an MP who will take the voice for those least audible in policy and unheard in debate, and proudly take up their voice. That’s why I’m backing Ryan.

quotes.text: We need an MP who will take the voice for those least audible in policy and unheard in debate, and proudly take up their voice. That’s why I’m backing Ryan.

images.caption: Ryan Henson leading different local campaigns and events in Bedford and Kempston.
